text: @realDonaldTrump Stop the panic. You can’t tweet - rage and make up facts. Btw , 100000 have died from #Covid19 . Why no #compassion or #empathy ? @kimguilfoyle @PressSec @andersoncooper @FareedZakaria @MELANIATRUMP @JoeNBC
